name: MineSleeper
description:
Are you a heavy sleeper? Are you a mine sweeper? Then prepare yourself for the glorious convergence of alarm clock and classic logic game that is... MineSleeper! This one of a kind application uses an intelligent version of Minesweeper to help you wake up, and it's totally customizable!

The Game: - No guessing or first-move-mines: GUARANTEED! - Touch and onscreen controls - Varying board sizes/difficulties (4x4 through 10x10) - Hint, reset, and help menu functions - A timer, to keep you motivated!

The Alarm: - Repeat weekly function - Crescendo volume option - Option to turn the game off - Vibrate option - Customizable snooze

So what are you waiting for? Seriously this is an alarm clock so you can set an alarm for whatever you're waiting for?

Special thanks to TeknoAXE for the trailer music.
